parse.title: List of theatre directors in the 20th and 21st centuries

text.*:
This is a list of theatre directors, living and dead, who have been active in the 20th and 21st centuries.

Contents

  • 1 Bengali speaking
  • 2 Chinese speaking
  • 3 English speaking
  • 4 Filipino speaking
  • 5 French speaking
  • 6 German speaking
  • 7 Hindi speaking
  • 8 Italian speaking
  • 9 Lithuanian speaking
  • 10 Norwegian speaking
  • 11 Persian speaking
  • 12 Polish speaking
  • 13 Portuguese speaking
  • 14 Russian speaking
  • 15 Serbo-Croatian speaking
  • 16 Spanish speaking
  • 17 Swedish speaking
  • 18 Multilingual
  • 19 Other
  • 20 References
